name: 楊元森
objective: 本課程將做為大一學生入學後第一門程式語言奠基課程，將教授Fortran 程式語言，包括程式設計原則、分支敘述、迴圈敘述、輸出、輸入敘述、陣列處理、字元處理、及子程式等課題。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Fortran Language
Week 2: Basic Elements of Fortran (1): Main program and WRITE
Week 3: Basic Elements of Fortran (2): Variables and READ
Week 4: Program Design and Branching Structures (1): Number system and flowchart
Week 5: Program Design and Branching Structures (2)
Week 6: Loops and Character Manipulation (1)
Week 7: Loops and Character Manipulation (2)
Week 8: Midterm simulation
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Review of Midterm
Week 11: Introduction to Arrays (1)
Week 12: Introduction to Arrays (2)
Week 13: Basic I/O Concepts (1)
Week 14: Basic I/O Concepts (2)
Week 15: Quiz
Week 16: Introduction to Procedures (1)
Week 17: Introduction to Procedures (2)
Week 18: Final
scorePolicy:
Attendance/interaction: 20% +/- 5%
Midterm: 30% +/- 5%
Final: 50% +/- 5%
Bonus: Class note 1% ~ 10%
materials:
1. Stephen J. Chapman, 2008, Fortran 95/2003 For Scientists and Engineers, McGrawHill. ISBN: 978-0-07-128578-0. (國內代理:滄海書局)
2. MinGW.org, http://www.mingw.org/ (Fortran編譯環境安裝)
